task.title: t_toothpaste
task.shortdesc: This task refers to the application of on a . It is intended to novices to this process, who have no experience at all with , toothbrushes or tube packaging.

taskbody.prereq: Make sure that you have obtained all required items.

step.cmd: Take the and the and go to the bathroom.
Put the on the washbasin or on the countertop, depending on the interior design of your bathroom.
step.info: You will not need the for a while.

step.cmd: Remove the cap from the tube.
Use your fingers to remove the silver safety seal from the tube opening.
Throw the safety seal to the litter bin.
While still holding the tube in one hand, pick the with your other hand.
Position the tube opening slightly above the bristle.
step.info: Ideally, the end of the tube opening should be located directly above the end of the bristle that is closer to your hand holding the .

step.cmd: Press lightly the rear area of the tube with your thumb.
step.info: Remember to press the rear area of the tube (rear area is the area on the opposite side of the tube opening). This helps control the rate of application.

step.cmd: While pressing the tube, observe the coming out and place it on the bristle.
Continue pressing the tube, while slowly moving the hand holding the away from the hand holding the toothpaste tube.
step.info: Remember that the opening must be located directly above the bristle at all times.

step.cmd: Once the you are applying on the reaches the other end of the bristle, stop pressing the tube.
step.info: Alternatively, you can stop pressing the tube even earlier. The result will be less on the .

taskbody.result: Toothpaste is present on the and you are ready to brush your teeth.
